summary: Provides utilities for parsing, representing, and comparing software version strings, including support for legacy version formats. Exposes a class that breaks a version into its constituent parts (epoch, release, pre‑release, post‑release, dev release, local identifier) and implements standard string and representation behavior.
business_intent: Ensures Checkov can reliably interpret and compare version numbers across different packaging schemes, enabling accurate dependency analysis, update checks, and reporting even when encountering non‑standard or legacy version strings.
